extensionDescription.message: 显示/移除重复的书签、空文件夹或描述

buttonMarkButFirst.message: 全部选中，除了每个组中第一项
buttonMarkButFirst.description: Button for marking all but first

buttonMarkButLast.message: 全部选中，除了每个组中最后一项
buttonMarkButLast.description: Button for marking all but last

buttonMarkButOldest.message: Mark all but oldest in each group
buttonMarkButOldest.description: Button for marking all but oldest

buttonMarkButNewest.message: Mark all but newest in each group
buttonMarkButNewest.description: Button for marking all but newest

buttonStripMarked.description: Button for stripping descriptions of marked bookmarks

buttonStopRemoving.description: Button for emergency stop of bookmark removing

buttonStopStripping.description: Button for emergency stop of description stripping

messageCount.description: Report specified number of marked bookmarks

messageExactMatchesGroups.description: Report specified numbers of exact matches and groups of all

messageSimilarMatchesGroups.description: Report specified numbers of similar matches and groups of all

messageEmpty.description: Report specified number of empty folders

messageRemoveInfo.message: Marked bookmarks refer to those since you last pressed the button to calculate the list.
messageRemoveInfo.description: Explain that bookmarks refer to those of last update of the list

messageRemoveMarked.description: Report that removal of marked bookmarks started

messageRemoveProgress.description: Report that specified number/total/percentage of bookmarks are removed

messageRemoveSuccess.description: Report success when removing specified number of bookmarks

messageRemoveError.message: 移除 $TOTAL$ 个书签时出错：$ERROR$
messageRemoveError.description: Report specified error after removing specified number of bookmarks

messageStripInfo.message: Stripping of descriptions will update the internal bookmark generation date. Moreover, it will move the bookmark to the location where it was since you last pressed the button to calculate this list.
messageStripInfo.description: Explain the side effects that stripping updates the date of bookmarks and moves them to the location of the last calculation of the list

messageStripMarked.message: 剥离已选中书签的描述

messageStripProgress.description: Report that specified number/total/percentage of descriptions are stripped

messageStripSuccess.description: Report success when stripping specified number of descriptions

messageStripError.message: 剥离 $TOTAL$ 个描述时出错：$ERROR$
messageStripError.description: Report specified error after stripping specified number of descriptions
